text: #Medicine is an imperfect #science. Always has been, will continue to be for foreseeable future. Critics of a “rushed” #vaccine, given the data, are dubious. Thousands die daily. I, instead, am #grateful. #ThankyouPfizer. #relieved #thankful #COVID19 #COVID19Vaccine #hope @YNHH https://t.co/7v8cFx5p3o
